website_summaries.verdict: Struggling with your mat defeats the purpose of yoga class. With this option, you can strap it on and go.
pros: No more struggling to get your mat in and out of bag
Adjustable strap holds most yoga mats on outside top of bag
Large full zippered main compartment, several smaller zippered and open pockets
cons: To reach anything in the zippered compartment, you must remove the mat

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: After considerable research, I settled on the purchase of this yoga mat bag, and I'm very, very happy with it. It's sharp looking, comfortable to carry, and has sufficient room for items such as towel, a block, t-shirt, etc. There are 2 mesh pockets and one zipper compartment on the inside. The outside has a mesh pocket on each end and also a zipper compartment on the outside. This bag has plenty of room, yet it doesn't feel bulky. It appears of high quality and is the only one like it that I could find. Plus, I am impressed with the customer focus of the company, that wants its purchasers to have a 5-star experience. Hats off to you, Asutra!
customer_reviews.author: S Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag!
customer_reviews.text: Received my yoga mat bag today. Perfect size for essentials like hot yoga mat, towel, cell phone, keys, and a few other extras inside bag, with carry space for full size yoga mat on top. Adjustable straps so you can carry down by your side, or lengthen to sling over your shoulder. Compact, but can pack a lot in the bag. Mesh pockets and outside as well as a zip pocket on the exterior. Very simple, well made and stylish looking. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MMArdo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super-light and a great size. Just big enough for my yoga togs, a cover-up, mat cleaner and even a mat towel. I've been looking for just the right multi-purpose mat carrier for a while and am very happy with this one. Also really like the external pocket for keys, credit cards, etc. It has two internal pockets that are just right for scrunchies and the mat cleaner & cloth. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn B

customer_reviews.title: Mat kept slipping off.
customer_reviews.text: Bag does not hold the mat securely even tightening it fully. Because the zipper is underneath the bag when mat isn’t secured, not convenient to ge5 to th8bgs if you forget something after securing mat. It’s a nice size and zipper in back is nice. The material is not the best quality nor is the strap.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Please advertise the circumference allowance of the strap, fitting a rolled up yoga mat.
customer_reviews.text: While it is an attractive design and made well, my thicker yoga mat did not fit and there was minimal strap allowance for an increased size/circumference. The sizing originally described was not clear to me when I ordered and I have returned the item. I do want to point out that the seller was very sincere in ensuring my transaction was handled efficiently and also ensure that future sales and future customers will have an excellent experience and quality product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mantel

customer_reviews.title: Four and a half stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like it; it's the perfect size for everything I need to take with me. As others have noted, the main pocket is inaccessible without detaching the yoga mat; it's a shame they couldn't have worked around that. It's not a huge issue; I would buy it again, but it keeps it from being perfect. There is a small pocket on the side but it's only big enough for keys and other very small items.
customer_reviews.author: Rika

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Yoga Mat Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This Yoga Mat Bag is exactly as described. It is lightweight and holds all of my essential items when I go to exercise and yoga classes. The bag is not bulky and oversized. It fits my needs perfectly! I would definitely purchase this bag as a gift! What a great touch to receive a bottle of yoga mat cleaner and cloth with my order. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's just as pictured, bigger than I expected, you can fit a water bottle, change of clothes & shoes, yoga mat, and even the microfiber and all natural lavender cleaning solution (that were included for free!) in this little bag! I love walking to and from yoga class without worrying that I'm gonna drop my mat and have to roll it back up and look ridiculous. Plus, it's just super cute! It even came with a handwritten thank you note from the makers! I love it so much and would buy it again, no doubt. Thank you so much for the bag, ladies!
customer_reviews.author: A. E.

customer_reviews.title: I'm super into this product but the main zipper broke :(
customer_reviews.text: I'm super into this product. I love how small it is. The straps are a little short for me but it took 2 seconds to attach a longer one (not included). I'm in love with the yoga mat cleaner they provide, I just wrap it up in my yoga mat when I'm done so I don't lose it. I'm able to fit: Towel Change of clothes (shirt, pants and socks) Flip flops Small container for coconut oil Bar of soap Wash cloth baby wipes Swim suit Goggles and of course my yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clever and Classy
customer_reviews.text: First this yoga mat bag surpasses any expectation I had -- it is very well made, classy in style and color, tons of room to carry your "stuff" in the secure zip pouch. It's a major bonus that ASUTRA is a small woman owned business -- this rocks! Thanks for a clever and classy way to carry my yoga goodies. I'll be embarking on my yoga certification and this is going to be a wonderful help mate. Thanks Barbara:)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Finally a yoga mat bag made for yogi's
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga bag, it holds my mat in place, and all my yoga surplus goodies, like mat spray, mat towel, hand towel, spare change of clothes. I've been using it for a couple of months now, and I keep wishing I'd had it years ago. This is the perfectly-sized and designed bag for the yogi in all of us. Thank you for finally making a yoga mat bag made for yogi's.
customer_reviews.author: goofyrider

customer_reviews.title: Size is appropriate for child not adult yogis.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so TINY. I was looking for a bag that could hold my yoga mat, yoga towel, a change of clothes and my deodorant, shampoo and conditioner travel size for after yoga. This bag couldn't. It could barely hold the yoga mat sturdy in the straps let alone fit more than yoga towel, walet, keys, and phone inside. It was also very flimsy. Will be returning, not what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: One stop shop

customer_reviews.title: Mat cleaner was missing.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is great, as described in photo. Large enough to hold yoga clothes, toiletries and such. However the awesome mat cleaner was never included in bag. When I called Amazon to get it replaced they said I could either return the bag and reorder or receive a credit. I thought it should be simple request just to send out the mat cleaner but that wasn't an option. **UPDATE Barbara from Asutra promptly contacted me to apologize about the missing mat cleaner and offered to send one out to home free of charge. I did receive it and am happy to update my original review. Still love the bag! Thank you Barbara for quickly addressing my concern.
customer_reviews.author: yogilov

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little yoga bag. It is big enough to hold a change of clothes, a thin towel, and my water bottle without being overly bulky. The zipper on the back is perfect for holding things I need quickly like my wallet and cell phone. The adjustable strap to hold the mat is great too because I can roll my towel up after class (the class is hot yoga, so the towel is pretty wet) and stick it into the same holder as the mat so that I don't have to put my sweaty towel back into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Traucins

customer_reviews.title: This is the Perfect Yoga Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this bag! Perfect size and holds the mat very secure. This bag is not excessively big like some, but just right with enough room inside for my hot yoga towel, hand towel flip flops, block and mat spray. Plus, pockets and a zipper compartment on the inside and also the outside. Adjustable strap allows you to adjust the bags length as you carry it on your shoulder. I searched for the perfect bag and am so happy I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Practical well-made yoga mat bag
customer_reviews.text: I decided to take up yoga again after being away from it for many years and was looking for a simple practical well-made bag to house my mat and a few odds and beds like cleaner, which is included with the bag and is awesome! I highly recommend this bag if you're looking for a beautiful practical and well-made yoga mat bag. ASTURA is also A women only run company, so I'm proud to support that for sure! Namaste
customer_reviews.author: K. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great. Good quality. Not a vinyl type material which is what I was expecting. It is soft and sturdy. I like that my mat sits on top of the bag and the other essentials ride underneath. I love the smell of the cleaner but I haven't used it enough to give a review yet. It doesn't leave a film or residue but I have not decided how it actually performs as a cleaner yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this bag and it certainly does the trick. My only gripe and it is perhaps something I should have looked into more when i bought the bag is, it is quite cramped when i throw may sneakers into it. I get that it is a YOGA bag and one doesn't wear sneakers in yoga however I often double up my classes with something else that requires sneakers. I've managed, but it's a little tricky. I also do wish the strap was on the bottom. Once the mat is buckled in, you cannot get to the contents inside. *Kerry*
customer_reviews.author: Jim Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag when commuting in a busy city!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has made commuting with my yoga mat super easy! I take the metro train to my yoga studio and even on crowded days it's simple to hold and doesn't bother anyone standing around me. I like how it rests on the side of your body and doesn't move around when you're walking! The inside is spacious and holds all of my essentials: water bottle, extra clothes, keys, and small towel. Definitely a must have bag!
customer_reviews.author: sp217

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bag!
customer_reviews.text: After looking and looking I've finally found the perfect yoga tote. I use an extra long Jade mat, meaning it is also a bit wider. None of the totes or bags that I tried truly fit or they had no storage. This bag is the Bomb! Just enough room to carry all of your odds and ends with the mat strapping on the top. Utter perfection in my book! I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Yoga Bag!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time Yogi, I was looking for a stylish bag with storage and that could carry my mat securely. This bag is wonderful and comes with an deliciously smelling cleaning spray and towel!! I had plenty of space for my water bottle, slippers, wallet, sunglasses and keys! Great buy, don't hesitate to purchase, you will be so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen_G

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It has lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It has lots of pockets. I wish it was a little bigger and the water bottle pockets could be bigger. I can't fit a standard water bottle in there so it's kind of useful for that.
customer_reviews.author: Purple_D

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and easy to carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to carry bag. I live in NYC and commute so this was a great bag compared to other yoga bags I've tried. I even use the bag on non-yoga days and carry it without the mat. I would definitely recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Dsp

customer_reviews.title: I really love how I can carry everything in this bag i ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love how I can carry everything in this bag i need for my yoga class. I load the bag up through it over my shoulder and i hike 3 miles and then join my yoga class for another hour then walk home it makes it very convenient . it is not to big but big enough. I plan on buying one for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Best bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. It is compact but holds a change of clothes or a towel plus water bottle. Pockets for keys, phone, and gym card. The straps are comfortable and adjustable and my yoga mat sits securely on top.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bag a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag a lot. Ive used a lot of other yoga bags and none seem to hold my extra thick mat. I can roll my mat and my knee pad and the strap holds both. I love the pouches on the inside, outside and the extra zipper on the back. Im super happy I took a chance and ordered this bag. I got the light gray and the color is true to picture. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bag, with plenty of room for my yoga blanket, towel, essential oils and water. I love that my mat is outside on top, allowing it to breathe. The free sample yoga mat spray is a great product too, better than what I normally buy at my studio!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Wreck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little bag. It is perfect for holding my yoga wear, towel, and mat when on the go to yoga from work. The cleaner is great, really nice it also came with a small microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: So happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really can't believe how nice this bag is. It's pretty, the fabric is great quality, the logo is printed well on the bag. It is a sturdy back with nice sized straps and is comfortable on my shoulder. Lots of room for items in the bag and a back zipper for easy access to keys and phone. And it actually smelled good out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: jdg

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag, it is very functional, has many spots to carry things like keys etc. I love the way it holds my mat so securely. It is also very nice looking and it doesn't smell like some other products that are filled with chemicals. The price is so reasonable and it also comes with a great smelling mat cleaner and cloth. Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Fit my block
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Fit my block, strap, mat cleaner/towel, eye pillow and yoga mat all in one. Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! When I received it my first thought was "I thought it was going to be bigger." But it easily fit a block, and a few other small things as well as side pockets to hold a water. It also has a back zipper pocket to hold your wallet or keys. I bought two of theses. One for myself and one for a friend. She loves it as well! It also holds my yoga mat very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya 4

customer_reviews.title: Namaste
customer_reviews.text: This bag is both cute AND perfect -- large interior pocket fits my towel, water bottle and more; exterior zipped pocket holds my cell phone, keys, wallet and so on. Adjustable straps hold the mat on securely, and the carrying handles adjust as well so you can either sling it over your shoulder or carry it with your hand. LOVE the included yoga mat spray -- it smells DIVINE. Received it quickly; very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice carrier for my yoga mat. The bag is actually a little big for what I need it for, so I have to pad it with a towel to keep it from collapsing under the weight of the mat. It will be perfect once I buy my own block. The lavender cleaner smells great and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: cloudysky

customer_reviews.title: I still like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I had asked the question, if 2 yoga blocks can fit in this bag-the answer I got was yes. The only way they fit is laying down side by side--however you can not zip the bag then. Having the yoga mat rolled on top is the only way that my stuff stays secure. I still like it a lot, but I wish I can zipper it with the blocks in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized bag for yoga necessities 🧘‍♀️ Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size !! I can fit my hot yoga towel , small toiletries bag inside , keys & cell phone in the outside zipper section , then snapped in the yoga mat on top and wahhalllllaaa!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The bag fits quite a bit of stuffs despite it being small. Love that about it. The only thing i didnt like was the materials used. It does feel very thin especially the strap. So obviously you cant carry extremely heavy as the strap might give out in the long run. Other than that, i am loving the bag. It carries most of my yoga essentials and more. I wouldnt mind buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love my new yoga bag! Perfect size...holds everything I need and looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Swerving

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Fits many different mat types.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my mom who wanted something she could use with her extra thick Pilates mat. This bag did the trick. It is a great small size for just a few items to take to the gym. I thought the quality of the handles could have been better which is why I took off the last star. But the bag was not expensive so I think it was a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: A great buy, even if it didn't include mat cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times so far, but this bag seems to be very well made. The separate storage compartments are great - my yoga towel, mat cleaner, clothes easily fit into the interior, while the exterior zippered pocket works perfectly for my phone, keys, and gym id. The strap and buble that hold a rolled mat are both sturdy. I can see myself using this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey & Jessi (4-ever)

customer_reviews.title: head bands and my exercise mat fits perfect on top strapped down
customer_reviews.text: It fits my two 3lb weights, small ball I use in Barre class, towel, socks, head bands and my exercise mat fits perfect on top strapped down. It was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the items, can't wait to use the items. Just bought a year worth of Yoga classes. I'm happy with my items. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good for carrying weights and mat together
customer_reviews.text: I can fit two free weights in the bag, with extra room for other stuff. Great for bringing mat & weights to a gym class when you don't want to use the communal equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Love my Asutra yoga mat bag
customer_reviews.text: I love my Austra yoga bag. Even my heavy mat is well balanced, I keep my wallet handy on the outside pocket, inside there is plenty of room for whatever I'm throwing in that day. ( often it's my grocery bags for after yoga/ gym errands.) It's a perfect fit for what I need. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: sylvie jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag for yoga class. There are side mesh pockets for keys, etc.. , a good size side zipper pocket on the outside, mesh pockets on the inside as well as more mesh pockets inside. I like the simplicity as well as attention to detail in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very functional, and cute, but smaller than I expected. Manduka mat works but dwarfs the bag. Bag has just enough room for yoga clothes, yogi toes mat, small towel, and small water bottle. Overall I like it, and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: The spray is amazing. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a well made product. The material is soft but durable. With the bag came a lavender yoga mat cleaner, which is all organic. The spray is amazing. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Compact size, especially for small people. Well designed and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It's not large enough for my clothes, toiletries, water bottle and yoga towel. I find dealing with it awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Done!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying my new Asutra bag. It's compact, well made and has plenty of handy compartments for keys, phone, etc. I especially like the exterior mesh compartments on the ends and the adjustable shoulder straps. Nicely done! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag allows me to carry my double rolled up mat without trying to squeeze it into a confined carrier. Love the space in the bag for my blocks and mat cleaner! As well as a bottle of water, glasses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper101

customer_reviews.title: It's well made and functional. It has plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and functional. It has plenty of space for my stuff and holds my very thick yoga mat. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact enough to not take up much room in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Compact enough to not take up much room in the studio but still carry everything I need for a class.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag holds my yoga mat perfectly plus many other personal items. It can even be used as a purse without a yoga mat. It was a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Romo

customer_reviews.title: Quality and care
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag, everything they promised. Also they really want you to be happy, and want to take care of their customers.
customer_reviews.author: pmh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for traveling light to class
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag! I did not want a large duffel bag and searched high and low for this style of bag. It was exactly what I needed for toting a light amount of items to yoga class.
customer_reviews.author: Jen (Huntingdon Valley, Pa)

customer_reviews.title: Compact yoga mat bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice if you just carry yoga mat and towel not much room for anything else...
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Extra compartments make it easier to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Extra compartments make it easier to keep things organized as needed. Center compartment is larger than I expected. Holds mat very securely on top. Stays on shoulder when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... yoga bags as part of an auction donation and liked it so much I bought one for myself
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these compact yoga bags as part of an auction donation and liked it so much I bought one for myself. Roomy enough to hold my wallet, phone, keys, water bottle and more. Perfect if I have to run errands after yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Erica P West

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Any Yoga! Strong and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, durable fabric bag large enough for a towel, change of clothes, and shoes. Lists of pockets for other yoga items. My mat is very long and wide and fits comfy and stable in the strap. Beautiful, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size for a yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a yoga bag. It holds all the essentials, and forces me to keep to the essentials! I love that the mat is on the outside and can air out on the way home (where I use the Asutra mat cleaner before re-packing for the next class).
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This bag is super fly--it fits my yoga towel and even gym shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super fly--it fits my yoga towel and even gym shoes on the inside along with whatever else I need -- sunglasses, keys and what have you. I also love the lavender mat spray that was sent as a gift! Smells great. I will definitely be ordering more things.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! There is enough room for a block, eye pillow, hot mat and towel with room to spare. Two zipper pockets, one inside and one out, and my yoga mat fits on top,
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Girl

customer_reviews.title: I don't really like the adjustable feature of the straps but it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag is large enough to hold yoga towel and change of clothes, but not so big to be bulky. I don't really like the adjustable feature of the straps but it's not bad enough for me to grade down in stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and very good product. The outside zippers are handy for items you would want to access when your mat is attached to your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good size and held my thick yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: The bag was everything I was hoping for. A good size and held my thick yoga mat. Would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect color and size
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect color and size. I love the storage areas. The free cleanser was a surprise, and much appreciated! 😀 The only recommendation I would make for future improvement is to maybe have a Velcro wrap to join the two handles at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Well made, strong stitching and straps. Perfect size for water bottle, mat and towel.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: The yoga bag is nicely constructed. There is a nice pocket below where ...
customer_reviews.text: The yoga bag is nicely constructed. There is a nice pocket below where the mat goes. My mat is very heavy and has a tendency to be off balance. A lighter one would better.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Lots of room for socks, phone essential oils. I even put my Mandela throw for shavasana. I use it for all my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and is just as described on Amazon. Very durable and functional. The free mat cleaner came with a cleaning cloth and was a nice bonus. I would definitely buy more products from Asutra "
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bringing only what you need to class.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bringing only what you need to class. Great size for a strap, block, a pair of sandals and a few small necessities. Tight fit for a thicker mat but works.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for any Yogi
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Compact Yoga Mat Bag and I absolutely love it. It fits all the things I need to bring for my yoga class and I just love the you can place the mat on top. It's made very well and is easy to carry and compact! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A Zavalis

customer_reviews.title: The bag is very stylish and like how its configured
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very stylish and like how its configured. Plenty of pockets as well. I got one for me and one as a gift. Would definitely recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K Koh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! I hate those over-sized bags
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! I hate those over-sized bags! Holds just what I need (towel, socks, water, wallet, keys, phone). Also, being a petite woman, this bag fits my body too.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: This bag is the perfect size to carry just the things I need to ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size to carry just the things I need to my yoga class. I like the individual pockets inside. An added bonus is the cleaner and towel that came with it!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget K. Dinardi

customer_reviews.title: I looked for a long time for a good, small yoga bag at a reasonable price and ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time for a good, small yoga bag at a reasonable price and this is the perfect bag. Holds all the essentials without being so big and bulky like many bags i saw. Especially like how easy it is to clip in my mat on the top.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars like All Other Reviews; Perfect Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: Cleverly designed, adjustable straps with just enough space for towel, spray, wallet, keys etc and whatever you need for the gym /class.
customer_reviews.author: DanikaDanika

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I think the bag is a perfect fit. It will fit only a standard size yoga mat which we're told in the description. I might suggest lengthening the strap to fit a thicker mat for more versatility. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya E. Mandolini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this adorable yoga bag. It was delivered faster then expected. It even fits my extra thick yoga mat!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: I walk to Yoga class and this bag is perfect! My wallet
customer_reviews.text: I walk to Yoga class and this bag is perfect! My wallet, phone, small towel,keys and water bottle fit.

customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for the gym for group fitness classes. it is perfect size - not too big and not too small.

customer_reviews.title: A yoga bag that matters!
customer_reviews.text: I love all this bag has to offer. It is lightweight, compartments rock and the bonus of the mat cleaner really made this special offer even more fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It is light weight and comfortable to carry. It holds my 2 mats, a blanket, my water bottle and side pocket for keys and wallet. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. Easy to store a few things, pockets make everything easier to separate. Straps are adjustable which makes it nice as well. I really like this bag

customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the "perfect" bag for my stuff and this is it! Absolutely the perfect size for my stuff. Love it!!

customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's stylish, compact and seems quite sturdy. It offers enough room for all your essentials without being bulky!
